api/SceneGate.Lemon.Containers.Converter.title: Class NodeContainer2BinaryIvfc | Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats
api/SceneGate.Lemon.Containers.Converter.keywords: Class NodeContainer2BinaryIvfc Converter for Binary streams into a file system following the IVFC tree format. Inheritance Object NodeContainer2BinaryIvfc Implements IConverter < NodeContainerFormat , BinaryFormat > Namespace : SceneGate.Lemon.Containers.Converters Assembly : SceneGate.Lemon.dll Syntax public class NodeContainer2BinaryIvfc : IInitializer<DataStream>, IConverter<NodeContainerFormat, BinaryFormat> Remarks The binary IVFC format consists in the following sections: * IVFC Header * Level 0 * Level 3 |--* File system header |--* Directories hash |--* Directories info |--* Files hash |--* Files info |--* File data * Level 1 * Level 2. Level 0, 1 and 2 only contain SHA-256 hashes of the upper layer. Level 3 contains the file system metadata and file data. Properties | Improve this Doc View Source MagicId Gets the magic identifier of the format. Declaration public static string MagicId { get; } Property Value Type Description String The magic ID of the format. | Improve this Doc View Source Version Gets the format version. Declaration public static uint Version { get; } Property Value Type Description UInt32 The format version. Methods | Improve this Doc View Source Convert(NodeContainerFormat) Converts a file system into a memory binary stream with IVFC format. Declaration public BinaryFormat Convert(NodeContainerFormat source) Parameters Type Name Description NodeContainerFormat source The node file system to convert. Returns Type Description BinaryFormat The memory binary stream with IVFC format. | Improve this Doc View Source Initialize(DataStream) Initialize the converter by providing the stream to write to. Declaration public void Initialize(DataStream parameters) Parameters Type Name Description DataStream parameters Stream to write to. Implements IConverter<, >

api/SceneGate.Lemon.Containers.Formats.h.title: Namespace SceneGate.Lemon.Containers.Formats | Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats
api/SceneGate.Lemon.Containers.Formats.h.keywords: Namespace SceneGate.Lemon.Containers.Formats Classes Ncch Nintendo Content Container Header. This is the format for the CXI and CFA specialization. It can contain up to two file systems and several special files. NcchHeader NCCH header information. Ncsd Nintendo CTR SD. This is the format for the CCI, NAND and CSU specializations. It can contains up to 8 containers / nodes. NcsdHeader NCCH header information. Enums FirmwareType File system type.

dev/Changelog.html.title: vNext (December 19, 2020) | Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats
dev/Changelog.html.keywords: vNext (December 19, 2020) As part of this release we had 5 issues closed. Enhancements #5 Upgrade build system, port .NET 5 and change namespace #4 Unpack the extended header and access descriptor from the NCCH #3 Implement CIA unpacker and TMD deserializer #1 Change license to MIT

guides/Contributing.html.title: Contributing to Lemon | Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats
guides/Contributing.html.keywords: Contributing to Lemon Refer to the Yarhl contributing guidelines .

index.html.title: Lemon | Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats
index.html.keywords: Lemon Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats. The library supports .NET 5.0 and above on Linux, Window and MacOS. <!-- prettier-ignore --> Release Package Stable Preview Azure Artifacts Supported formats Encryption, decryption or signature validation not supported yet. NCSD (CCI and CSU) : unpack CIA : unpack NCCH (CXI and CFA) : unpack ExeFS : unpack and pack RomFS : unpack and pack TMD : deserialize Documentation Feel free to ask any question in the project Discussion site! Check our on-line API documentation . Build The project requires to build .NET 5.0 SDK, .NET Core 3.1 runtime and .NET Framework 4.8 or latest Mono. If you open the project with VS Code and you did install the VS Code Remote Containers extension, you can have an already pre-configured development environment with Docker or Podman. To build, test and generate artifacts run: # Only required the first time dotnet tool restore # Default target is Stage-Artifacts dotnet cake To just build and test quickly, run: dotnet cake --target=BuildTest References 3D Brew

README.html.title: Lemon | Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats
README.html.keywords: Lemon Yarhl plugin for Nintendo 3DS common formats. The library supports .NET 5.0 and above on Linux, Window and MacOS. <!-- prettier-ignore --> Release Package Stable Preview Azure Artifacts Supported formats Encryption, decryption or signature validation not supported yet. NCSD (CCI and CSU) : unpack CIA : unpack NCCH (CXI and CFA) : unpack ExeFS : unpack and pack RomFS : unpack and pack TMD : deserialize Documentation Feel free to ask any question in the project Discussion site! Check our on-line API documentation . Build The project requires to build .NET 5.0 SDK, .NET Core 3.1 runtime and .NET Framework 4.8 or latest Mono. If you open the project with VS Code and you did install the VS Code Remote Containers extension, you can have an already pre-configured development environment with Docker or Podman. To build, test and generate artifacts run: # Only required the first time dotnet tool restore # Default target is Stage-Artifacts dotnet cake To just build and test quickly, run: dotnet cake --target=BuildTest References 3D Brew
